paper_title.ja: 寒冷地における農地空間形式の歴史的意義
少雪寒冷な酪農流域における融雪融凍期の水質水文環境(共著)
北海道東部の畑作地帯における降雨流出時の河川水質特性(共著)
農業流域における融雪期の水質環境と土地利用ー主成分分析による河川水質形成機構の解析ー(共著)
paper_title.en: Relationship between Water Quality Environment and Landuse in an Agricultural Watershed during Snowmelt Period. Principal Component Analysis of River Water Quality.:Principal Component Analysis of River Water Quality

description.ja: 農業流域で融雪期ほぼ全期間にわたる水質調査を行った.河川水質のN,P,SSおよび主要イオン濃度連続データについて主成分分析し,水質変動を3主成分に統合した.湧水と表面流去水水質から,これら3主成分は,水質成分が河川に流出する際における流出形態(溶存態/懸濁態)と流出経路(地表面/地下)を表すと解釈できた.すなわち,第1主成分が地表面経路による溶存態成分の流出,第2主成分が高流量時における懸濁態成分の流出,第3主成分が地下経路による溶存態成分の流出を示すと考えられた.求められた主成分のうち,とくに第1,第3主成分の性質は,農業的土地利用が高度に進んでいること,河川間際まで農地が広がり河川周辺に畜舎が存在することなど,流域の農業活動を密接に反映していた.
description.en: The water quality of a river in an agricultural watershed was investigated for most of the snowmelt period. Principal component analysis was carried out on the continuous concentration data of N, P, SS and major ions of river water. Water quality changes could be separated into three principal components. Based on the quality of spring water and that of surface runoff water, these three principal components were interpreted as a combined indicator of differences in runoff form (dissolved vs. particulate) and runoff process (surface vs. underground). The 1st principal component expressed dissolved form of surface runoff, the 2nd principal component expressed particulate form during high discharge, and the 3rd principal component expressed dissolved form by underground discharge. The characteristics of the 1st and the 3rd principal components closely reflect the agricultural activities in the watershed, i.e., heavy agricultural land use and the existence of farmland and livestock yards very close to the river.
